snippet: Bishops and priests across the country will preach a coordinated message next month backing changes that include a path to citizenship for unauthorized immigrants.
abstract: Catholic bishops and priests from major dioceses across United States will preach coordinated message in September backing changes in immigration policy, with some urging Congress to pass legislative overhaul that includes path to citizenship for unauthorized immigrants.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

lead_paragraph: Bishops and priests across the country will preach a coordinated message next month backing changes that include a path to citizenship for unauthorized immigrants.

headline.main: Catholic Push to Overhaul Immigration Goes to Pews
headline.print_headline: Catholic Push To Overhaul Immigration Goes to Pews
